thread.title: Renaissance Technologies to Close $1 Billion Hedge Fund - WSJ
thread.title_full: Renaissance Technologies to Close $1 Billion Hedge Fund - WSJ

author: Rob Copeland
title: Renaissance Technologies to Close $1 Billion Hedge Fund - WSJ
text:
Quantitative hedge-fund giant Renaissance Technologies LLC is shutting an underperforming fund “due to a lack of investor interest,” according to a letter to investors reviewed by The Wall Street Journal.
The $27 billion firm said it would wind down its Institutional Futures Fund, which manages around $1 billion, by the end of the month.
